content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_delta/', --se debe consultar a esta altura ya que ahi esta la carpeta 'delta_log'
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS vehicle_registration;

--Revisar el tipo de dato que le asigna synapse
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK ''vehicle_registration_delta/'', 
    DATA_SOURCE = ''electric_vehicle_data_bronze'',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
) AS vehicle_registration;'


--Asignar un tipo de dato especifico y seleccionar solo las columnas necesarias
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_delta/', 
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)WITH(
    propietaryId        TINYINT,
    dolVehicleId        INT,
    year                VARCHAR(4),
    month               VARCHAR(2)
) AS vehicle_registration;


SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT locationId)
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'vehicle_registration_delta/', 
    DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS vehicle_registration
WHERE year= '2024' AND month = '01';
